description: Vibrant green and silky, this quick-to-make recipe celebrates the flavours of summer.
keywords: Cold soup,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Chilled Pea & Avocado Soup Shot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe avocados halved, peeled, and stoned

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the peas in boiling water for 2 minutes and drain.
Purée all the ingredients together in a food processor until smooth, and taste to check the seasoning.
Garnish with the sour cream and finely chopped coriander.
